ai-mnd1:78.15_0: the one who has crossed over to the far shore,
ai-mnd1:79.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha,
ai-mnd1:80.1_0: “A brahmin who has crossed over and stands on the far shore is a term for a perfected one.
ai-mnd1:80.2_0: The realization of the fruits, abolishing the present life, abolishing the way to realize the fruit of stream-entry, and perfection.
ai-mnd1:80.3_0: The realization of all beings, which gives up all suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path, which lead to all suffering and so as to the present life, and the way leading to the ending of all suffering.
ai-mnd1:80.4_0: He has reached the far shore, and has reached the far shore. You’ve attained perfection. I mastered the noble spectrum of ethics, immersion, wisdom, and freedom.
ai-mnd1:80.5_0: He has arrived at the untroubled and attaining perfection. He has reached the end of the deathless and has reached the end of the deathless and attain extinguishment.
ai-mnd1:80.6_0: Because they have given up searching for definitions and retravanitys, has reached the end of the spiritual path and developed the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up the defilements. The path should be given up by direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and cessation.
ai-mnd1:81.1_0: He has glorious intentions, definitely examined, quite secluded from sense desires, secluded from unwholesome things, he is an undetermined, possessed of (supernatural) insight, endowed with five factors, is endowed with good intentions, has reached the ultimate foundation of the four noble truths, sublimeness, and is devoted to level, endowed with perfect insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-mnd1:81.2_0: He neither accumulates nor accumulates, but remains after getting rid of them.
ai-mnd1:81.3_0: They neither give up nor grasp, but remain after giving them up.
ai-mnd1:81.4_0: He neither sews nor sews it, but remains after sewing it.
ai-mnd1:81.5_0: They neither dissipate nor get clouded by, but remain after dissipating them.
ai-mnd1:81.6_0: He possesses the virtue consisting in the entire spectrum of an adept’s ethics,
ai-mnd1:81.8_0: the entire spectrum of an adept’s wisdom,
ai-mnd1:81.10_0: With an adept’s knowledge and vision of freedom, they possess the knowledge and vision of freedom.
ai-mnd1:81.12_0: After geting beyond it, it stands after giving it up.
ai-mnd1:81.14_0: Without going, standing on the journey
ai-mnd1:81.16_0: habitually is the end of what is connected with the thought.
ai-mnd1:81.17_0: if he is staying with loving-kindness;
ai-mnd1:81.19_0: Through the glorious joy he has known ...
ai-mnd1:81.21_0: if he stands within the monastic boundary;
ai-mnd1:81.22_0: if he is standing in one who is seeking purity;
ai-mnd1:81.24_0: it’s content if it is content.
ai-mnd1:81.28_0: if he stands on the number;
ai-mnd1:81.32_0: Similes after a roaming on transmigration.
ai-mnd1:81.34_0: standing, they’re not attached to rebirth.
ai-mnd1:81.36_0: You don’t bear your final body,
ai-mnd1:82.1_0: This is the last state of existence.
ai-mnd1:82.2_0: this bag of bones is my last
ai-mnd1:82.4_0: there are no future lives for them.”
ai-mnd1:83.1_0: like a ship crossing the far shore.
ai-mnd1:84.4_0: having crossed over the far shore.”
